page.title: 17A School Day at Burford
page.content: I was asleep when the alarm went off at 7 o'clock precisely.Then I got up and had a bath.I dressed in my T-shirt and skirt.At 7-30 I had breakfast of Crunchy Nut Cornflakes.Then Mum took me to school for 9-00.We did about Anglo-Saxons.Then at 10-35 we went out to play.When we came in at 11-00 we did Maths until lunch at 12-00.We had sausages,spaghetti and chips,afterwards we played in the playground.At 1-10pm we came in,then went to watch a TV programme called Seeing and Doing.After I did Topic work on Badgers.At 3-10 I went home with Sarah and stayed the night with her. Annabelle Rose aged 9 (20th May'85)
